sources.title: Guest in the House (1944)
sources.description: Story of a young woman's obsessive love. Evelyn (Anne Baxter), an emotionally unstable woman, stays at the home of her doctor Dan Proctor (Scott McKay). She meets and falls in love with the doctors brother Douglas, but he is already happily married. Evelyn decides she will break up the marriage. Mystic Nights Videos

Mystic Nights Videos This file has better video quality than the one I previously uploaded.

sources.title: Guest in the House (1944)
sources.description: Evelyn, an emotionally vulnerable and unstable woman, stays at the home of her doctor Dan Proctor. There she meets and falls in love with his brother, Douglas, who is happily married to Ann. Evelyn then sets forth to break up the happy marriage and win the love of Douglas. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/guest-in-the-house-1944/

sources.title: Guest In The House (1944) ANNE BAXTER
sources.description:
Stars: Anne Baxter, Ralph Bellamy, Marie McDonald
Director: John Brahm

In this psychological thriller, an unstable, obsessive young woman stays at the home of her doctor -- with tragic results!

metadata.Plot: A young manipulative woman moves in with her fiancé's family and turns a happy household against itself.
metadata.Director: John Brahm, John Cromwell, André De Toth
metadata.Writer: Ketti Frings, Hagar Wilde, Dale Eunson
metadata.Actors: Anne Baxter, Ralph Bellamy, Aline MacMahon
